snippet: Many states are currently finalizing rates in the small-group market for next year. So far, the indications seem to be that the rate increases facing most employees insured through a small business will be considerably less than many predicted.
abstract: Many states are currently finalizing rates in the small-group market for next year. So far, the indications seem to be that the rate increases facing most employees insured through a small business will be considerably less than many predicted.

headline.main: How Fast Are Small-Business Health Premiums Rising?

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
